exceptions.tactic: destruct (quotient_projection_surjective A R xbar) as [x Hx].
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Type R : Relation A f : A -> B equiv : equivalence R well_defined : forall x y : A, R x y -> f x = f y xbar : quotient R The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "quotient ?R".
The reference x was not found in the current environment.
The reference x was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment A, B : Type R : Relation A f : A -> B equiv : equivalence R well_defined : forall x y : A, R x y -> f x = f y xbar : quotient R Unable to unify "R ?M1670 ?M1671" with "exists ! y : B, exists x : A, quotient_projection R x = xbar /\\ f x = y".

In environment A, B : Type R : Relation A f : A -> B equiv : equivalence R well_defined : forall x y : A, R x y -> f x = f y xbar : quotient R Unable to unify "f ?M1667 = f ?M1668" with "exists ! y : B, exists x : A, quotient_projection R x = xbar /\\ f x = y".

original: intros xbar. destruct (quotient_projection_surjective A R xbar) as [x Hx]. exists (f x). exists x. split. - apply quotient_projection_minimally_collapses_R with (R := R); auto. - apply well_defined.
